Today's automotive leaders face new and pressing challenges: rising customer expectations, emerging technologies and intensifying competitive pressures. Success depends on finding new ways to create value and distribute the value benefits.

This stream of engineering studies deals with the design, creation, manufacture and operation of machines relevant to automobiles ranging from the ubiquitous motorcycle to buses and trucks. Combining industry knowledge and innovating solutions, this time at Tathva, MetaWing comes up with a short term professional course designed for young individuals on Automotive and Engine Design. Apart from being an impeccable opportunity for you to learn the basic concepts, it will surely act as a platform to gain the practical experience while unfolding every part of the engine.

MetaWing is well acknowledged as pioneers in conducting interactive training programmes in India in which an open engine is showcased so that the students can enhance their knowledge and experimentation skills. They have developed a prototype for a Gyro Car (a self balancing 2 wheel car) which is made to run by a water engine, All Terrain Vehicle, Solaris and many more.

All the concepts are explained in detail with the Help of Theory and with Specially Designed Animations which would help students to visualize things before practically working on it.

1. 16 hours of certified workshop accompanied with practical implementation to give you a glimpse of different areas in the Automation and Engine Designing industry.
2. Study Materials to be given to every student so as to keep a note of what he/she has studied hitherto.
3. Students will be given an opportunity to work on an open engine parts and moulds.
4. Further help in industrial projects and Placement guidance.
5. Career consultancy for GRE, MBA and other job opportunities.
6. Chance to win an International Internship in USA, Germany, Singapore etc.
7. International Certification from ISTP-Canada,SGT-International and AIESEC chennai as certifying bodies.
8. Online certificate verification.

1. In-depth knowledge of Engine Design and its applications
2. Opportunity to get into top notch Automation Industry
3. Firsthand experience of working on high end projects
4. There will be two practical sessions:
 a. One on assembling and de-assembling of whole engine with all designing aspects.
 b. Second practical on a Commercial car covering each and every aspect of it.
5. Also 20 merit students will get to work on Industrial RandD projects.
6. Merit certificates for Merit students and partcipation certificates for all from ISTp-Canada, SGT-International,AIESEC Chennai with company certification.

1. Introduction
2. Types of Locomotive vehicles
3. Chassis Design
4. Suspension Unit
5. Types of Suspension
6. Rear suspension - dependent type
7. Braking Unit
8. Practical on soft ware's like CAD/CATIA
9. Transmission System
10. Engine Design
11. Alternate Fuels and Propulsion Techniques
12. Electronics and Electrical system
13. Interactive sessions

Duration: 2 days (8 hours on each day)
Date: Oct 21 and 22, 2011
Organizers: MetaWing
Cost: Rs 1000/- per person.
